ComicInfo.Summary:
It is the dawn of machines. It is the doom of man. It is the day of reckoning. The wheels are set in motion for the extinction of the human race and the rise of ruthless, intelligent machines known as Terminators. But one man, John Connor, can prevent a bleak future that's already happened from ever coming to be. That means until he's erased from existence, he's the sole obsession of the Terminators. In the bleak wastes of Death Valley, CA, two of these killing machines have be sent to find Connor as a boy. But the Terminators didn't calculate the possibility of someone finding the boy first - someone with a killer's past and a score to settle.
